channel.description: Recent content in development on Moritz Friedrich

item.title: Portable Development Setup
item.description: Due to switching jobs, and my beloved 2013-ish MacBook Pro finally failing on me for good, I’m in a somewhat unsuspected situation: The only computing devices available to me are my smartphone and an old Chromebook which Google gifted to me at MessengerPeople, so we could have a Meet coversation with their sales people. It is a rather old and cheap model, with a slow dual core CPU and 3GB of RAM–all in all, the last thing you’d probably want to do any reasonable software development on.
